content: * *Joanne Ooi** (born December 13, 1967) is a [Singaporean American](/wiki/Singaporean_American) environmentalist, art dealer, marketing expert, founder & CEO of Plukka. ## Early life and education Ooi is the eldest child of two doctors, who are both [Chinese Singaporean](/wiki/Chinese_Singaporean). She was born in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), but moved to the [Cincinnati, Ohio](/wiki/Cincinnati,_Ohio), in the United States. She graduated from [Columbia University](/wiki/Columbia_University) in 1989 and earned her law degree from the [University of Pennsylvania](/wiki/University_of_Pennsylvania). ## Career Ooi served as the [Creative Director](/wiki/Creative_Director) of [Shanghai Tang](/wiki/Shanghai_Tang) for seven years. During her time with the company Ooi chose to focus on clothes that were based on traditional Chinese designs and themes, with sales for *Shanghai Tang* increasing 50%. Ooi was also one of the first persons to use Chinese models in international advertising campaigns and is credited with launching the career of Chinese [supermodel](/wiki/Supermodel), [Du Juan](/wiki/Du_Juan). Beginning in 2009, Ooi operated as the CEO of the environmental organization [Clean Air Network](/wiki/Clean_Air_Network), which focused on [air pollution](/wiki/Air_pollution) and [public health](/wiki/Public_health). Ooi, together with fellow Clean Air Network CEO Christine Loh, was nominated for [Time Magazine's](/wiki/Time_Magazine) "100 Most Influential" list in 2011. Ooi frequently speaks and comments on a wide variety of topics, including luxury retail, ecommerce, [digital marketing](/wiki/Digital_marketing), creativity and entrepreneurship. ## Plukka In December 2011 Ooi launched *Plukka*, an [ecommerce](/wiki/Ecommerce) website that specializes in fine jewelry. Ooi, together with Jai Waney, chose to open the website after noticing the steep markup for designer jewelry. Plukkaâ€™s business model made waves in the industry for its made-to-order platform that cut out the middlemen associated with traditional fine-jewellery distribution. This approach allows it to maintain extremely competitive pricing while offering directional and artistic jewellery that might be considered too risky or creative for conventional retailers. ## Personal life She lives in [Hong Kong](/wiki/Hong_Kong) with her husband John and son Sam. ## Awards - 2011: Nominated for [Time 100](/wiki/Time_100) Most Influential People in the World list - 2013: Most Promising Entrepreneur, Asia Pacific Entrepreneurship Awards - Plukka - MotherPlukka Blog Archived 2016-04-22 at the [Wayback Machine](/wiki/Wayback_Machine) - Clean Air Network
title: Joanne Ooi
